api/OmiyaGames.Menus.html.keywords: Namespace OmiyaGames.Menus Classes AudioVolumeControls A helper script to handle audio slider and checkbox. BackgroundMenu The GUI background. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . ConfirmationMenu A singleton script that retains information about which scene to switch to. Where possible, it'll animate the SceneTransitionMenu before switching scenes. ControllerSensitivityControls A helper script to handle controller sensitivity sliders and checkbox combination. CreditsMenu Scrolling credits. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . HighScoresMenu HowToPlayMenu Menu that provides a tutorial and/or on how to play the game. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . IMenu Abstract class for creating menus. MenuManager will seek for these scripts at the start of a scene. IOptionsMenu A Helper script for other options menu. ISceneChangingMenu A common interface for menus that swithes scenes. LanguageToggle Script to handle listening to a toggle button on a langauge. LevelCompleteMenu Menu indicating you've completed a level. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . LevelFailedMenu Menu indicating game-over. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . LevelIntroMenu Menu indicating important information before starting a level. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . MalformedGameMenu Dialog indicating this game may not be genuine. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . MenuManager A singleton script that retrieves all IMenu s in the scene. MenuNavigator A script to setup navigation of a menu. NewHighScoreMenu A script to setup menu to enter new high score. OptionsAccessibilityMenu Menu that provides accessibility options. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . OptionsAudioMenu Menu that provides audio options. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . OptionsControlsMenu Menu that provides controls options. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . OptionsGraphicsMenu Menu that provides graphics options. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . OptionsLanguageMenu Menu that provides language options. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . OptionsListMenu Menu that provides a list of option categories. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . PauseMenu Menu that appears when you press the pause button (based on the "Pause" Input Manager field). You can also retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . StartMenu Menu that appears on the start of the game, allowing you to change options, select a level, or quit the game. You can retrieve this menu from the singleton script, MenuManager . TopRecordRow UiEventAudio A script to handle audio for various UI events. UiEventNavigation A script to handle navigation on select. WebLinkOpener A script for opening links in a TextMeshPro link. api/OmiyaGames.Translations.TranslationM.keywords: Class TranslationManager Calls another script to parse a CSV in a specific format. Parses out different languages from that file, and key/value pairs for a single language. Also provides interface for retrieving those values based on a key, as well as changing the the current langage. index.html.title: Omiya Games - Template Unity Project | Template Unity Project documentation
index.html.keywords: Omiya Games - Template Unity Project This is a template Unity project Omiya Games ' uses to start their game project. Project Layout In this Unity project, the following folders has the following roles: Required by Unity: Assets A folder required by Unity. Contains assets used for the game. See the README.md in that folder for more details. Packages ProjectSettings Optional, visible: Builds~ A folder where its contents are ignored by Git. Typically where game builds are created in. UnimportedAssets~ A folder that Git versions, but Unity doesn't detect. Typically where unfinished art assets are placed in. Documentation~ Folder containing files on generating documentation for this project. Optional, hidden: .github Files for Github-specific features. .vscode Files for Visual Code-specific features. More Info Some packages this template uses: Embed WebGL Template Cryptography Common Other resources: API Documentation Change Log
